SEARCH
Package org.GameObjects

Class MainCharacter

java.lang.Object
org.GameObjects.MovableObject
org.GameObjects.MainCharacter
public class MainCharacter extends MovableObject
Entity used to encode all information on our game's main character, controlled by the player: a turtle trying to reach the ocean.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class org.GameObjects.MovableObject

    collidableArea, collidableAreaDefaultX, collidableAreaDefaultY, collisionOn, height, speed, width, xPos, yPos

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MainCharacter(Screen screen, KeyHandler handler, CollisionDetector collisionDetector, ImmovableObjectDisplay objDisplayer, TileManager tileM)
    Initializes all main character variables, sets the initial position of the player, sets the starting direction faced and speed, and loads the turtle sprite.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainCharacter

      public MainCharacter(Screen screen, KeyHandler handler, CollisionDetector collisionDetector, ImmovableObjectDisplay objDisplayer, TileManager tileM)
      Initializes all main character variables, sets the initial position of the player, sets the starting direction faced and speed, and loads the turtle sprite.
      Parameters:
      screen - screen main character is displayed on
      handler - object that handles user input
      collisionDetector - object that handles collisions with immovable objects and tiles
      objDisplayer - object that display immovable objects to screen
      tileM - object that contains information on tiles

  • Method Details

    • setStartingValues

      public void setStartingValues(int speed, String direction)
      Set default values for the main character, including position, speed, and direction faced.
      Parameters:
      speed - how many pixels the main character moves when a key is pressed to move
      direction - initial direction the main character is facing

    • getImage

      public void getImage()
      Load all four turtle sprites.

    • touchObject

      public void touchObject(int objectType)
      Handles logic for when the player touches an immovable object.
      Parameters:
      objectType - index representing the type of the object corresponding to the objects[] array in Screen

    • exitCave

      public void exitCave(int tileType)
      Handles logic for when player touches an ocean tile.
      Parameters:
      tileType - index representing the type of the object corresponding to the objects[] array in Screen

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates player position and sprite on key press.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g)
      Display correct turtle sprite to screen, depending on direction faced
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object to protect

    • getNumCarrotsCollected

      public int getNumCarrotsCollected()

    • getDirection
